articles.author: Julia Kollewe
articles.title: Apple co-founder warns AI could make it harder to spot scams - The Guardian
articles.description: Steve Wozniak says content created with artificial intelligence should be labelled and calls for regulation
articles.content:
Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak has warned that artificial intelligence could be used by bad actors and make it harder to spot scams and misinformation.
Wozniak, who was one of Apples co-founders wit… [+7589 chars]
